name: Desk Trolls
description:
Submission for VimJam2 2021

Requirement: Boss

Theme: On The Edge

Play as the boss of mischievous troll monkeys. When the humans leave the house, your job is to send your workers in to cause mischief, sending items on coffee tables around the house. Working On The Edge of a time limit, and the edge of a table, can you get rid of every thing on the table before the humans return?

Throw items off the table by directing workers to the item and then directing the item to the edge of the table. Once On the Edge, the Desk trolls will take care of the rest. Once you throw it off the edge, use your currency to buy more trolls, to throw heavier items off the table. Be smart with your time and resources.

Controls--------------------------

WASD - Move Camera Around

Left Mouse Button - Select Worker/Object ready to be moved

Right Mouse - Cancel current selection

Built on stream at twitch.tv/0mnomnomivrore
